url:
Spreadsheet (CSV) URL/path. (An exemple is available as 'default.csv' in the root folder)
FORMAT: {fullURL} or ./{subfolders}/{filename}.csv
LQPS:
Label for Qualifications Point Sum. The label of the column where the sum of the qualifications points is stored.
FORMAT: {columnname}
picture_column:
column where the name of pictures of the members are stored.
FORMAT: {columnname}
member_column:
column where the name of members are stored.
FORMAT: {membername}
save_folder:
folder where the cards will be saved.
FORMAT: ./{pathtofolder}
picture_folder:
folder where the pictures of the members are stored.
FORMAT: ./{pathtofolder}
h_font_path:
path to the font file for the heading. It needs to be a TrueTypeFont format (.ttf).
FORMAT: ./{subfolders}/{filename}.ttf
t_font_path:
path to the font file for the text. It needs to be a TrueTypeFont format (.ttf).
FORMAT: ./{subfolders}/{filename}.ttf
g_diam_w:
path to the white diamond image.
FORMAT: ./{subfolders}/{filename}.{imageextension}
g_diam_b:
path to the black diamond image.
FORMAT: ./{subfolders}/{filename}.{imageextension}
bg:
path to the background image.
FORMAT: ./{subfolders}/{filename}.{imageextension}
h_width_fraction:
portion of canvas width the HEADING text width aim to be.
FORMAT: {number}
t_width_fraction:
portion of canvas width the text width aim to be.
FORMAT: {number}
XH:
X coordinate of the heading.
FORMAT: {number}
YH:
Y coordinate of the heading.
FORMAT: {number}
XK:
X coordinate of the key.
FORMAT: {number}
GYK1:
Y coordinate1 of the key.
FORMAT: {number}
GYK2:
Y coordinate2 of the key.
FORMAT: {number}
P_y:
Y coordinate of the picture.
FORMAT: {number}
redux1:
reduction factor of the picture after a first resize to standart photo format.
FORMAT: {number}
redux2:
reduction factor of the picture after a first resize.
FORMAT: {number}
